Title: Provides a tax credit for the purchase of on-farm anaerobic digesters or other farm-related equipment that is used in the process of turning farm waste into methane for commercial use
Summary: Provides a tax credit for the purchase of on-farm anaerobic digesters or other farm-related equipment that is used in the process of turning farm waste into methane for commercial use.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit for the purchase of on-farm anaerobic digesters or other farm-related equipment that is used in the process of turning farm waste into methane for commercial use
